title: Range error: Array size is not a small enough positive integer error shown when opening chat (public or 1x1)
body:
# Problem

`Array size is not a small enough positive integer` error shown when sending tokens in 1x1 chat. Can't get it manually but autotests sometimes do see this issue.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/58888978-dc6e4d00-86f0-11e9-8318-d0377e294625.png)


## Steps

1. open status
2. as device A request 0.004131042 stt
3. as device B respond to the request

## Logs

